alert.note: Alert for North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:21PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wasco County through 445 PM PDT... At 421 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Pine Grove, or 15 miles southeast of Government Camp, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Warm Springs Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
